document.full_text: american electric carmaker tesla motors inc said on wednesday it is suing the bbc's hit motoring show top gear for allegedly faking a race between its electric sports car and a petrol-driven lotus elise.
document.title: tesla sues bbc's top gear over roadster race
lines_and_colors: american electric carmaker tesla motors inc said on wednesday it is suing the bbc's hit motoring show top gear for allegedly faking a race between its electric sports car and a petrol-driven lotus elise.
